Articles.Content:
Nope

Xannari Ferrows

I appear to be wanted again.

Honey, where'd you get to?

Honey? Go look for some bees if you want it.

Any rocket scientists around?

Nope, just space warship scientists here (BTW, Sampa had joined me and Gag for some Starmade. He ditched us for WoWS (Dangit Wargaming)!

I will still guess that a rocket scientist will come around next though.

Yeah, I could definitively use a rocket scientist, too.

Unfortunately, I'm not one.

I don't study my own kind.

Perhaps a certain Mega Absol?

Perhaps you are right.

Where's my psychic rival?

Would I count?

Xan

Xan is ded.

Has anyone ever tried to circumnavigate with a basic jet?

Don't you dare joke about my deth.

I have once, but this guy knows all about it.

Me? No, I don't.

But any decent rocket scientist should be capable of doing so.

Sorry, there's no rocket scientist available today.

Maybe a pro-Cerberus man who has an affair with a KSP-playing Pokemon can take his place for now?

*poof*

Windows?

Yes, sir, how may I serve you?

Perhaps you'd like Xannari to assist you with your needs.

I prefer Balconies.

I'm sorry you exploded on reentry. Your crew will not be forgotten.

EDIT: But you will.

Rude.

Alert, a man attempting to delude people has been detected.

Rats...and I would have gotten away with it too, if it weren't for you meddling kids!

Xan!

WHAT!?

I didn't know Enders was a ruler...

HE IS!?

I gotta tell this to Columbia, man.

Oh noes!

Windows, please elaborate more!

Yes, dear Columbia, Endersmens apparently IS a ruler! How embarrassing!

By the way, Xannari, where did you get that piece of info about Endersmens from?

A very reliable source.

You can find a page about the space shuttle there as well.

Damnit, I was wondering why my sisters were docking to space stations and resupplying while I was just doing Spacelab experiments!

Endersmens, can you clarify that you are indeed.. a ruler?

I don't know anything

Wait what is going on Endersmans?

He really should get to replying on this thread

Endersmens will explain to us his absence in this thread in the post directly below this.

Edited August 22, 2015 by Noname117
